overview: When the wealthy owner of an upscale brothel dies, our hero Victor, is sent on a wild goose chase to find the three beautiful heiresses.  His only clue is that each of the three women have a hamster branded on their buttocks!  When the girls are mysteriously murdered, it is up to Victor to solve the murders.
tagline: Meet the man from O.R.G.Y. He's a natural agent...He makes his best contacts in bed!
title: The Man from O.R.G.Y.
